name: Incoming! (itch)
description:
Incoming! was made in 5 hours for GBC Jam 11 with the theme Frantic.

Requires a Twitch stream and viewers.

Control your keyboard to defeat waves of oncoming enemies controlled by your Twitch chat.

Player: Press the assigned key to shoot in that lane. If a single enemy touches you, it's game over.

Viewer: Type any of the letters shown on the lanes into chat. That will spawn an enemy in that lane.
